name: Jumping Jacks
description: Full-body cardio exercise great for warming up and burning calories.

description: Upper body strength exercise targeting chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Squats
description: Lower body exercise targeting quadriceps, glutes, and hamstrings.

name: Lunges
description: Unilateral leg exercise that improves balance and leg strength.

name: Plank
description: Core strengthening exercise that engages multiple muscle groups.

name: Burpees
description: Full-body high-intensity exercise combining squat, plank, and jump.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: High-intensity cardio exercise that strengthens core and legs.

name: High Knees
description: Cardio exercise that improves coordination and leg strength.

name: Wall Sit
description: Isometric exercise that strengthens quadriceps and glutes.

name: Arm Circles
description: Simple warm-up exercise for shoulder mobility and activation.

name: Side Plank
description: Core exercise that targets obliques and improves stability.

name: Bicycle Crunches
description: Abdominal exercise that targets rectus abdominis and obliques.

name: Glute Bridges
description: Lower body exercise that strengthens glutes and hamstrings.

name: Step-Ups
description: Functional exercise that improves leg strength and balance.

name: Skater Jumps
description: Lateral movement exercise that improves agility and leg power.

name: Tricep Dips
description: Upper body exercise targeting triceps using body weight.

name: Flutter Kicks
description: Core exercise that targets lower abdominals and hip flexors.

name: Calf Raises
description: Lower leg exercise that strengthens calf muscles.

name: Side Lunges
description: Lateral movement exercise that targets inner and outer thighs.

name: Bear Crawl
description: Full-body exercise that improves coordination and strength.
